Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Tias (Puerto del Carmen), Apartamentos Relaxia Lanzaplaya is convenient to Puerto del Carmen Beach and Rancho Texas Park. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Lanzarote Golf Resort and Pocillos Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 168 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided on a limited basis.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include bicycles to rent. This apartment also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos Relaxia Lanzaplaya, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Apartamentos Relaxia Lanzaplaya, or stop in at a grocery/convenience store. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Tias (Puerto del Carmen), Apartamentos Relaxia Lanzaplaya is convenient to Puerto del Carmen Beach and Rancho Texas Park. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Lanzarote Golf Resort and Pocillos Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puerto del Carmen Beach - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Pocillos Beach - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Whale and Dolphin Museum - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Deiland Shopping Center - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Quemada Beach - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Centro Asociado de la UNED de Lanzarote - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Sports City of Lanzarote - 10.9 km / 6.8 mi
Timanfaya National Park - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Cesar Manrique Foundation - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Papagayo Beach - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Costa Teguise Golf Club - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Marina Rubicon - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi
Playa Dorada - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi

The preferred airport for Apartamentos Relaxia Lanzaplaya is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
